title: Werewolf
description: Landon Murphy, a werewolf with a knack for tracking, a penchant for killing, and an affinity for the bottle, is thrown for a loop when he meets LillyAnna and Jamie, individuals who will change his life forever. Add to that a serial killer with no discernable pattern, and a threat no one saw coming, and Landon's life reaches a boiling point. Spanning the globe with vampires and other werewolves, Werewolf is a new breed of werewolf fiction.
author: Greg Hair
